recipe.title: Four Cheese Mac 'n' Cheese Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ¼ cup ; grated monterey jack cheese ; (30 g)
¼ cup ; grated mozzarella cheese ; (30 g)
¼ cup ; grated cheddar cheese ; (30 g)
¼ cup ; grated parmesan cheese ; (30 g)

steps.step: Cook 1 box of Mac 'N' Cheese according to instructions on box.
Add monterey jack cheese, mozzarella cheese, cheddar cheese, parmesan cheese and pepper, stir until fully incorporated.
Top with desired garnish. Serve immediately.

steps_updated.steps_updated: Cook 1 box of Mac 'N' Cheese according to instructions on box.
Add monterey jack cheese, mozzarella cheese, cheddar cheese, parmesan cheese and pepper, stir until fully incorporated.
